text: Allahale nai pranaharula'i uniharuko mrtyuko samaya ra jasako mrtyu a'ena tyasala'i usako nidrako avasthama grasta garihaldacha. Ani jasako mrtyuko nirnaya garisakeko cha, tyasala'i rokirakhdacha. Ra aru pranaharula'i eka nirdharita samayasam'mako lagi chodidincha. Niscaya nai yasama socavicara garneharuko nimti kaiyan nisaniharu chan
